Everybody Loves Raymond: The Complete Series Various (Actor, Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Comedy ['Standup comedian Ray Romano stars as Ray Barone, a successful sportswriter who deals with his brother and parents, who happen to live across the street. Cheers: The Complete Series Ted Danson (Actor), Kirstie Alley (Actor), Multiple (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Boxed Sets ["Wander in...pull up a stool...and make yourself at home where everybody knows your name with Cheers: The Complete Series, featuring all 270 episodes from 11 seasons, plus a host of exciting featurettes on 45 discs with vivid picture and sound quality. Ted Danson stars as Sam Malone, former relief-pitcher for the Boston Red Sox turned sober saloon owner of a popular neighborhood spot. Add a colorful cast of co-stars (Shelley Long, Kirstie Alley, Rhea Perlman, George Wendt, John Ratzenberger, Nicholas Colasanto, Woody Harrelson, and Kelsey Grammer) and you're all set to raise a glass to the legendary, 28-time Emmy ® Award -winning series GQ Magazine calls pretty much perfect."] {'Genre': 'Comedy/Television', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Contributor': 'Multiple, Ted Danson, Woody Harrelson, Kelsey Grammer, Shelley Long, John Ratzenberger, Kirstie Alley, George Wendt, Rhea PerlmanMultiple, Ted Danson, Woody Harrelson, Kelsey Grammer, Shelley Long, John Ratzenberger, Kirstie Alley, George Wendt, Rhea Perlman See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '45', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.66 Pounds', 'Item model number': '32429219183', 'Director': 'Multiple', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Run time': '110 hours and 26 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 5, 2015', 'Actors': 'Ted Danson, Kirstie Alley, Woody Harrelson, Shelley Long, Rhea Perlman', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Number of discs': '45'} Always loved this series, now I can watch whenever I want to. profile:
User Summary:

This user continues to demonstrate a profound appreciation for classic comedic series, underscoring their nostalgia and commitment to exceptional storytelling. Recently, they encountered some frustration with a prior purchase that fell short of expectations, yet their latest review showcases a positive shift, as they expressed enthusiasm for another series, awarding it a glowing rating of 5.0. This indicates a broader engagement with quality content that resonates emotionally and keeps them eagerly anticipating future episodes.

Key preferences and trends:
- Maintains a strong affinity for nostalgic series that foster deep emotional connections and relatable humor.
- Shows a discerning taste with an impressive average rating of 4.9, highlighting an appreciation for production quality and storytelling that explores mature themes within comedic contexts.
- Displays a critical eye for quality, evidenced by their willingness to express disappointment with previous purchases while simultaneously celebrating titles that captivate their interest.
- Shared viewing experiences remain a key aspect of their consumption habits, reflecting their desire for content that emphasizes family connections.

Overall, the user is an engaged viewer continually seeking a blend of humor and depth in their entertainment. Their recent experience of being "hooked" on a new series reinforces their commitment to exploring films and shows that resonate on both emotional and storytelling levels, further solidifying their profile as a discerning consumer of quality entertainment.
